price: 2. (Nuux) Wuxuu yidhi: Tolkaygiiyow! Waxaan anigu idiin ahay dige cad.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
